description: An illustration of a Playbill for the program for the Broadway staging of the musical "Hamilton." The cover of the program includes the Playbill banner (bright yellow with the word PLAYBILL in a black, all-capitals font) and four out of five points of a star in black with the silhouette of a man pointing upwards with his left arm forming the fifth point, all in black against a pale red background. Notably, the background color in this Vertex (pale red) does not match that of the official Broadway Playbill for "Hamilton," which is a golden yellow.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
